job_description: Senior Quality Assurance Analyst (Temp) - job post Worldwide Express 157 reviews Dallas, TX 75219 • Remote Temporary Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Temporary PURPOSE The Sr. Quality Assurance (QA) Analyst will help develop and implement appropriate test methodologies, test plans and test cases which will ensure products released to customers are at high quality and error-free. In addition, this position will utilize appropriate test tools, process and practices as defined by the Director of QE and the QA Lead for functional, systems-integration as well as building in quality standards throughout the SDLC to avoid defects and minimize rework and waste. ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES Develop and implement appropriate test plans for functional and systems-integration testing efforts Participate in sprint planning, user story grooming, defining acceptance criteria’s, design walkthroughs so QA can inject quality early in the development life cycle Closely collaborate with other scrum team members (Product owners, Systems Analysts, Developers) to ensure business and technical requirements are fully understood Ensure that business requirements are fully met before each release; certify releases for quality and completeness of functionality Assist in reviewing, analyzing and documenting business and user requirements for technology product development. Generate periodic test reports showing test metrics (defects trending, planned vs actual testing progress) (7c3rmo) REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS/ABILITIES Understanding of the industry, specific WWEX business model, and unique characteristics of the Company Detailed understanding of Quality Assurance tools, practices, and success measures. Agile development methodologies Common business practices and software product design and development Building collaborative relationships Verbal and written communication skills Problem Solving Relationship building both within the organization and with external sources Presentation and facilitation skills Analytical Deductive and inductive reasoning Critical thinking Technical Expertise QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s Degree, Computer Science, Engineering or related preferred 5+ years of Quality Assurance testing experience in a web application environment testing User Interfaces, Web services, Micro services, API’s, backend database application components 5+ years of hands-on experience in writing test plans, test cases for simple to complex application enhancements 3+ years of hands-on experience in writing SQL scripts and defects management 1+years of experience working in a Scrum Agile, Continuous Integration/Delivery, Fast phase environment supporting weekly or daily production deployments Solid understanding of QA testing methodologies, test scenarios development techniques and defects management Prior experience with SalesForce CRM, MuleSoft/Mule is a plus. If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
